data.text:
@SCMountainDad Thank you!
My son had it two weeks ago so we are taking this in stages.  Thanks again.
@EricPoppen1 Get well soon Eric! I can do some grocery runs for you if you are in a bind. Happy to help if you need it.

@EricPoppen1 Hope you get well soon!  When I had it in my lungs someone told me to only lay on stomach not lay on back and it seemed to help. After several days Dr. gave me steroids to help with breathing and z-pack to help with pneumonia. All while taking a daily vitamin cocktail. https://t.co/54vBIMe8Tb
